Home

At Giuseppe's Italian Restaurant, you'll find the best authentic Italian fare in town!

We are open daily for lunch and dinner. And be sure to visit us early on Sunday to try our special brunch menu, featuring our house special Eggs Benedict Bruschetta!

Hours of Operation

  • Monday-Thursday: 11:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m.
  • Friday-Saturday: 11:00 a.m. - 11:00 p.m.
  • Sunday: 9:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m.
